title: THUNDERPANTS and Other Not-So-Super Heroes: 5 Very Short Stories of Adventure and Disappointment
description: Strange powers, ill-timed opportunities, getting fired...You'll find all this and more in this collection of five very short superhero stories. Equal parts funny, depressing, ridiculous, and outrageous, this collection shows how even the lives of superheroes aren't all that different from your own.
author: Robert Pipkin
